mapper.select: SELECT pen_group_name FROM tb_temp_pen GROUP BY pen_group_name

SELECT pen_info_name, pen_group_name, pen_name, pen_color, CASE WHEN pen_group_name IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END AS pen_info_yn FROM tb_temp_pen_info AS pen_info LEFT OUTER JOIN ( SELECT * FROM tb_temp_pen WHERE pen_group_name = #{pen_group_name} )AS pen ON pen_info.pen_info_name = pen.pen_name ORDER BY idx

SELECT GROUP_CONCAT(pen_name) FROM tb_temp_pen WHERE 1=1
AND pen_group_name = #{pen_group_name}
